select u_id, user.name, location, tel, user.create_time, user.update_time from user LEFT JOIN account A on user.u_id = A.id where A.REMOVED = '0'
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{account.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
